resources.string: You are currently not within a masjid.
It looks like your masjid is not in our database. Please visit our GitHub page and submit an issue to help us add your masjid.
Please grant Notifications permission to the app, it is required to make the app work in the background.
Please grant Precise Location permission to the app, it is required for the app\'s core functionality.
Please grant Do Not Disturb permission to the app, it is required to change the phone\'s ringer mode.
Please grant Background Location permission to the app, it is required for the app\'s core functionality. (Click \"Allow all the time\")
